page.title: 13Recreation in Haslington.
page.content: Many ativities involved both adult and children with parents often joing in withorganisation and supervision.Swimming,football,ice skating,horse riding,strawberry picking,shopping and watching television were among the many shared activities .A sense of sharing and togetherness is important to the community.Solitary leisure acts included playing musical instruments,dancing,bird watching,playing with pets for the children and for adults gardening, car repairing,decorating their homes. For sheer relaxation and interest,many adults preferred to meet friends and neighbours in a local public house in the evenings-Friday and Saturday being the most popular meeting days.
